title: LexImpact
baseline: Simulate the impact of tax reforms on citizens.
desc1: Powered by Etalab and part of the EIG program (General Interest Entrepreneur), the team works with admninistrator within the French National Assembly.
desc2: This project aims at helping administrators and deputees to simulate the impact of reforms on the government budget before its vote.
desc3: LexImpact started in 2019 and is still in progress.
simulation: runs a simulation on a population
perimetre: uses all of the tax & benefit system
